content.detailedDescription: My wife was outside with the dogs and called me to look at this things in the sky. it looked like a plane but it was moving almost like someone in the distance waving around a flashlight. it was high in the sky and just hung there bouncing. we watached for awhile. we moved around the yard to make sure it wasn't the angle we were at but no matter were we were at the object just hung there and was moving in a bouncing manner. there were several shooting starts out when wer were out. the lights were white and occasionally flashed red. i ruled out it being a plane from the movement. i wish i had more info or pictures. i'm hoping that someone else in the area saw this. it was in the east night sky towards michigan city and south bend.
content.summary: Saw what thought was a plane but hung in the sky bouncing

content.detailedDescription:
In mid august of 2005 i seen 3 non human humanoid entities outside my window in plainfield indiana in (saratoga)(claymont)on the west side of town in plainfield,they walked in a line not side by side,and they walked like zombies only quiker,there backs were bent,there arms were just dangeling,and there heads just dangeling too,but cocked a little to stare at me,however i could not make out the fingers and toes,and facial features,i stared at them and they stared at me, untill i lost sight of them,  then i went into a major panic, my heart was beating very fast , i could not use my legs , and it was very hard for me to keep my eyes open, but i was afraid to colse my eyes i was afraid to fall asleep,eventually i waited it out and slowly but surly i could walk again and open my eyes and heart slowed down to normal speed,


if anyone has seen anything like this let me know,especially in my area
content.summary: No ufo, just the entities

content.detailedDescription:
In mid august of 2005 i seen 3 non human humanoid entities outside my window in plainfield indiana in (saratoga)(claymont)on the west side of town in plainfield,they walked in a line not side by side,and they walked like zombies only quiker,there backs were bent,there arms were just dangeling,and there heads just dangeling too,but cocked a little to stare at me,however i could not make out the fingers and toes,and facial features,i stared at them and they stared at me, untill i lost sight of them,  then i went into a major panic, my heart was beating very fast , i could not use my legs , and it was very hard for me to keep my eyes open, but i was afraid to colse my eyes i was afraid to fall asleep,eventually i waited it out and slowly but surly i could walk again and open my eyes and heart slowed down to normal speed,


if anyone has seen anything like this let me know,especially in my area
content.summary: No ufo, just the entities

content.detailedDescription:
I was travelling home from work along 600 n, a quiet backroad.  suddenly a noticed a light off in the ne.  it was orangey yellow color and it seemed to explode, then quickly fade.  four or five other occurances shortly afterward were seen, but below and to the left of the first light.  this had an appearance of a falling object, like a shooting star.  i was difficult to say whether it was one object or many.  it looked a little like a comet, except it was slow moving (if it was moving) and was not a constant streak. it could have been some kind of flare, if the usaf at grisson are telling the truth.  however, it would have to be something new because i haven't seen a flare like this one.   i have witnessed other lights that in no way shape or form led me to believe flares were responsible.  however, this case i could possibly believe that.
sorry my descriptions are not very clear.  to the life of me i was struggling with how to explain what i saw tonight.
content.summary: Unusual orange . yellow lights

content.detailedDescription:
While driving in the car with my two children (age 4 and 7), we witnessed a large gold orb in the sky.  golden orbs in the sky.
this event, today, occured in the west, north west.  one golden orb appeared in the sky.  i called it out to my kids, who also witnessed it.  the orb split in to 3 orbs, each dropping down slightly from the other (like stair steps).  the all appeared stationary, not falling.  we watched them glow a bright gold color, and then merge back in to the upper orb.  shortly after that, the orb faded into nothing.
the sky was completely clear.
there was air traffic noted, but nothing that comes close to what we saw.

-please note, i have seen these objects before.  mostly in the west, or north west.  they have behaved the same before.  i decided to file a report this time as my 7 year old said "dad, i want to know more about what we saw.  we need to tell someone!".
content.summary: 1 gold orb split into 3, then back to 1

content.detailedDescription: First, i am a tv reporter so im telling this to you to perhaps look into. in the town of long prairie, mn on december 11th at 12:17pm a hugh boom was heard throughout business and streets on the south side of town (right infront of the auto value store) the explosion was so big that police closed off highway 71 for a short time and people got out of there cars. witnesses say the sound and impact went through their bodies and was unbeleivable.  one man described it as an exploding ufo, others say an earthquake or sonic boom. the problem with both of the later two theorys is that they're were no reported aircraft in the area and the usgs says it wasn't an earthquake.
content.summary: A huge boom or explosion was heard in town, but authorites have no explanation what it was from.

content.detailedDescription:
My sister, her friend, and myself were all outside when a very bright meteor/comet streaked across the sky lighting the entire area up blue.  afterwards in response to this we watched the sky, as over the next hour, around 10-15 more meteor/asteroids streaked over head.  finally in conclusion an object streaked across the sky with a purple trail and quickly went straight up in a smooth l shape.  the event lasted only seconds and as it did the maneuver it made a large bang / swoosh sound as if the sound barrier had been broken.  the trail of the objected lasted during the entire upward path, but once again the entire incident lasted maybe 3-4 seconds.

in addition to include the questions on the side;

1. we were outside talking when the first meteor/asteroid went over
2. the color and brightness of the final object was extremely vivid and we were already looking at the sky
3. immediately i knew it obviously was not a meteor or comet and i have full knowledge that no known military aircraft emit a purple trail and travel in such ways.
4. movements described above
5. complete amazement of the entire night, first time ever seeing 'shooting star'.
6. i could only follow it going straight up for a few seconds.

(p.S. when you have a form error and request to go back all information is lost!  this is extremely annoying as i had to re-input this description once and had to reselect details many times.)
content.summary: Meteor shower / unknown?

content.detailedDescription: At about 7:35 pm i was watching tv and looked out the window just as a fireball dropped out of the sky. i was like a shooting star dropping towards the ground vertically. i went downstairs and another member of my family said that she saw a flash out the window as well. at school the next day, another student said that he saw the sighting as well around the same time. he lives about 20 miles away from my location. i am aware that one of the space shuttles is docked with the international space station at this time to. it almost reminded me of a fireball similar to one of the pieces of space shuttle columbia coming apart a few years ago. i was shocked to see what i did as i am an avid ufo enthusiast, but i am also skeptical as to how this sighting could be something normal. the incident occured in the span of 4 seconds and the fireball disappeared at the tree line, where it either 'landed' or finished burning out. it was also kind of like a firework falling towards the ground.
content.summary: A fireball dropped out of the sky

content.detailedDescription: Driving west on interstate 80 in illinois, outside of lasalle peru (west) me and my passenger saw a green ball of light to the south for about 5 seconds, over the farmland. it had some sort of tail/trail and traveled very fast before it disappeared. may have been 1/2 mile away or so but really couldn't tell because of the darkness.
content.summary: Green ball of light with trail

content.detailedDescription: A saw them very close and i saw aone of them  i met this ufo s alote &(gust saw them)
content.summary: Is saw them alot

content.detailedDescription: En route from rochester, mn, to atlanta on 11-27-06.  went to paducah walgreen's (sullivan & hwy. 60.); they had just locked doors at 2200 central time.  went to wal-mart approx. one block away, purchased items and walked through parking lot to my car.  night was foggy, cloud cover low and thick.  i looked up at sky to see if any stars were visible and saw event described above.  due to fog and clouds, i could not make out any definite shape, nor even determine if it appeared to be solid object.  i had no context by which to judge distance, but luminescent color shone clearly through fog and cloud cover.  regardless of distance, it flew much faster than any military jet i have ever observed, whether close up or at a distrance.  movement was not erratic.  trajectory is an estimate based on my perspective.  after event i looked at my watch; it said 2230 central time.  i looked around parking lot to see if anyone else might have seen it; the dozen or so people outside showed no indication of having watched the sky.  i waited a few minutes for potential evidence of a crash, such as a loud noise or bright explosion.  nothing happened.  i had never seen anything like this before.  my reaction was, "wow!"  i was curious, impressed, amazed, but not frightened.  what i saw was "unidentified." by me at least, it certainly appeared to be "flying," and it behaved like an "object."  but as i said before, poor visibility prevented me from reaching an opinion whether it was a solid object or a cohesive pocket of green luminescent gas.
content.summary: Luminescent pale green color (presumably an object), approx. size of quarter at arm's length, flew from west at high speed on apparent ese trajectory toward ground

content.detailedDescription:
My mother and i were returning from a christmas party from covington. i was driving the car, with my mother in the passenger seat. we were several miles out of west point on sr 25.  we suddenly became aware of six orange lights in the sky, in close proximity to each other.  at first i thought it was a reflection off of something, but realized there didn't seem to be anything to reflect off of.  the lights remained on for approximately 20 seconds before fading out.  it was difficult to tell if they were moving.  shortly after another single light appeared to our right, before also disappearing.  the weather was lightly overcast, with an occasional light drizzle. i pulled this off the local weather page if it helps:

wind speed:  	 9 mph  / 15 km/h / 4.1 m/s
wind dir: 	140��� (se)
ceiling: 8500 ft / 2590 m 


my mother and i have been around aircraft for a very long time. this did not seem to be any aircraft.  we were wondering if it could have been lights reflecting off of the clouds.  however, we had previous witnessed some identifiable lights earlier this year when there were no clouds, and these did move.  the local paper suggested that these were flares from the local airbase.  we found that very hard to belive.
content.summary: 6 orange lights in sky

content.detailedDescription: i was video taping an object from my bathroom window, that is on the second floor of my house.  this object was very high in the sky, when i noticed what i thought was a chemtrail coming from it.  as i was taping this object, from my right i saw what appeared to be a very bright flash of light. i moved the camcorder to see what it was, and i caught this black large tip, from what i thought, would have been a huge black triangular craft, moving over my house, but that was after i viewed the video.  in the video there appears to be beams of light coming from both objects.  as you can see in the photos i took from the video, the object, or craft, is much darker then the sky.  there was absolutely no sound coming from it. i was facing south, the object was over my house with the tip also facing south.  in the video, it shows it moving slowly in a northerly direction. if the light wasen't turned on, i might have missed it altogether when i viewed the video.  the light configuration is somewhat  puzzeling, as it moves it's location on the tip. i've sent mr. hickman photos of the object.  i will send him the video, as soon as he sends me his p.O.Box address.
content.summary: Large black triangular craft moving slowly over my house.

content.detailedDescription:
My wife, 32-year-old son, two grandchildren, ages 2 and 7, and i were driving from eaton, ohio to our home in dayton at about 9p.M. on decemger 9, 2006 when my wife, sandy said, "is that a plane over there? because it doesn't seem to be moving."
we all looked where she was pointing and saw a multi-colored, star-like object in the southeastern sky about 30 degrees above the horizon. it pulsed, arhythmically, and, three colors alternately dominated.
the object remained in the same spot for about an hour-long ride home. we stopped a few times on dark country roads to view it more clearly.
when we arrived home at 10:30p.M., my wife, our son and i took turns viewing the object through 10x binoculars from our front yard. through the binoculars the object's light appeared extremely intense. the colors, red, white and blue, were absolutely brilliant and crystal clear. the red was especally remarkable; it was an incredibly intense metallic red. i believe that all three colors were always visible, but alternately dominated in brilliance.
the next afternoon i was talking to a close friend and began to tell him about what we had seen the night before. before i even described the object and had only said, "let me tell you what we saw in the sky last night, in the southeast, about..." he interrupted and said, "was it multi-colored and flickering?"
he went on to tell me that he had first seen it at about 6:30 p.M. and had observed it for an hour. he said that it had immediately caught his eye and described it exactly as my family and i had seen it. 
we went out the following night to see if it was still there, but, the sky was so cloudy that we neither saw the object nor any stars. 
this is not the first strange object that we have seen in the sky over the past year--nor the strangest.
i am a 59 year-old man. i have a college degree and work in the medical field as a certified medical dosimetrist. i have no criminal record. i have no history of hallucinations or any other mental disorders. with glasses, which i always wear, i have perfect eyesight. i am a christian and not given to falsehood or embellishment.
i am not insisting that what we saw was an alien craft. i would be satisfied with whatever reasonable explanation you could provide.
thank you very much,
david l. warren
content.summary: Pulsating, multi-colored starlike object in southeastern sky for several hours. witnessed by several people.

content.detailedDescription:
I took two pics (10 seconds apart) of the sunset standing in front of my house looking down the street.  my digital camera lens was zoomed in all the way at 7x. in the first pic it's not visible, but i noticed something when i looked at the second one.  i zoomed in on it using photoshop & wow!  i wish i had noticed it when i was taking the photo and had my camera set to the highest quality setting.  my best guess to it's location is - it was over the sacramento river & approx. 10 miles south of sac. international airport.

here it is!  the first pic is untouched.  using photoshop 7.0, on the second one, i zoomed in, cropped, tweaked the contrast a little, & increased the resolution.  on the third one, i zoomed in, cropped, increased the resolution, & tweaked the contrast way up.
content.summary: Sunset ufo

content.detailedDescription:
I was driving home from chandler to maricopa through the gila river indian reservation (on the southern edge of the phoenix metro area). i had turned from riggs rd onto hwy 347, and curved around the mountain and was heading into maricopa when i noticed several dark orange, bright circular lights in the sky (like the color of street lights). at first i thought it was a bright street light, but as i got closer to maricopa, i realized it was much higher than a street light would have been.  as i was coming into maricopa, i could see that there were three lights, equidistant from each other, but set off from the first light i saw.

i drove through maricopa until i was in open land again, and could see a total of four lights about 5 miles to the southwest, several thousand feet up. there were three lights in a straight line, and a fourth light a little ways off, making a very large, elongated isosceles triangle. the lights would randomly flicker on and off - sometimes off for 30 seconds and then flicker on in the same location. the whole thing was stationary - it hovered silently and did not move.  there were no smoke trails.  i watched for a couple minutes - the total duration from when i first saw them until they totally flickered off was about 20 minutes. i turned around to head home, and as i was driving back in my subdivision, i could see the one light again at the top of the triangle (maybe 10 minutes after i left). the whole thing was stationary, and didn't move the entire time.

i felt compelled to watch it - i couldn't take my eyes off of it.  i have never seen anything like this before.  after lights flickered off, i sat in my car watching where it was for a minute or so, and realizing it wasn't coming back on, went home.
content.summary: Four amber lights in triangle formation

content.detailedDescription:
I was in my kitchen doing the dishes (i've stopped just now at 5:25 to report this), looking west out my window that is above the sink (i was looking at the clouds speculating about any weather change).  it is cloudy outside and just beginning to get dark.  the western sky was still fairly bright.  an object in the sky appeared in the southwest and moved across my field of vision to the northwest.  at first i thought it was a conventional aircraft because it seemed the same height in the air, but its movement was more "floating" - almost like a bird, but it was obviously larger than a bird and this object had no wings and no flapping or irregular movement as a bird would.  i would have thought it was a balloon, but it was the wrong shape, had no basket underneath and it moved in a horizontal straight line.  i called my 15 year old son in to look at it because i wasn't sure what it was.

as it moved northwest it was not possible to see it out of the window at that point, we both ran outside in our driveway to look.  there was no engine or other type of sound - the object was silent as far as we could tell.  it was easier to see it outside even though it had moved farther away, because we were not looking through a pane of glass and window screen.  it looked at that point like a solid triangular shape rotating flat side down.  it was still moving at a slow, steady rate of speed but our view was blocked by some trees so we ran in the back of the house to see it further.  at that point it was no longer visible - it either had moved faster out of our sight or it had moved up into the clouds.  there are also bare trees out there which make visibility less than optimal.

the whole incident probably lasted about two minutes or so.  my son and i came back in the house and speculated a few minutes about what conventional craft/item it may have been (ranging from weather balloon to black plastic bag high in the air).  we've eliminated everything we can think of because it did not look or behave like any of those.  this is the second time that i have seen a ufo in my life (the first time was actually more definite than this one), so i made note of the time and then decided maybe i should report it right away.

i don't want to call local authorities because i don't want to be treated with scorn.  my first sighting was when i was in the 8th grade (1968) and i was naive enough to mention it back then, thinking that the fact that my mother had also seen it was proof enough.  everyone's reaction was pretty bad.  this is also why i called my son to look at it - i wanted another witness.

i would normally think this was a normal airplane (i live near blue ash airport and it lies in that northwest direction) but the shape was wrong, it almost appeared to be going too slow for an airplane, and it made no sound.  in addition, most aircraft have lights on by this time of day in the winter, although it would still be possible that the pilot didn't turn them on yet i suppose.  i see aircraft all the time and have all of my life because i've grown up and lived near airports for nearly all of my 52 years.

if you can, please let me know if anyone else has sighted a ufo this same evening.  i realize it may yet be a conventional object, but i cannot think of what.  according to my computer, it is now 5:54 p.M. est. i have no working camera for this sighting, and it was getting dim outside anyway, so no pictures - sorry! thank you.
content.summary: Dark gray triangle no reflection/lights seemed to be rotating

content.detailedDescription: The first picture was taken on november 20, 2006 at 6:48 am as i was taking my dog out. the sky was a beautiful color and i took a few moments to capture it in pictures. also, at the time this picture was taken, there was absolutely no air traffic. i did not see these lights with my eyes, only in the pictures afterwards. also, the next two pictures were taken the very next morning, november 21, 2006 at 7:00 am above my garage. again, i didn't see these with my eyes, only later after they were downloaded.
content.summary: My own recent sighting.........

content.detailedDescription: I was driving west on us 10 toward sanford tonight around 9:00 pm. i saw a large object fly across the expressway from north to south. it appeared to be triangular in shape with a large red light on one corner and a large white light on another corner, then smaller lights on the third corner. i thought it was probably a plane and it was so low that i thought it was going to crash somewhere on the south side of the road. it turned and appeared to hover above the trees and when i saw it do that i pulled over to the side of the road and jumped out of my car. it then flew toward midland airstrip but it was so low i could not see it anymore and it was raining so i figure it was a plane but i don't know of any plane that can turn so sharp and then hover as it appeared to. i also believe the airstrip might not be manned by any persons but i don't know who to ask about that. i was driving home from a cousins house. i lost sight of the object because of trees. it was after stark road exit so actually the express way curves around to the right so the object didn't actually dissapear close to the airstrip. it would have been further west of the airstrip. as i stood outside my vehicle i watched it go down on the north side and then i lost sight of it because of the trees. i was not too excited when i saw this as i have seen much more interesting and odd things before in my life.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Triangle shaped object flew very low over trees.

content.detailedDescription:
I had thought ufos were gone from our area until near the end of november.
i had just gotten out of school and headed for the parking lot. i looked up and saw a very shiny object in the sky. it was moving in sort of a wavy
path at about a the speed of a plane(it might have actually been a plane) it made no sound at all. this sighting lasted about a minute but it seemed like i was the only one who could see it. then it dissappeared behind a tree.

the second sighting was in longview washington right outside win co
i looked up in the sky and saw the same object that i had seen at the rainier high school. it didn't make any noise that time either. this time i looked at it closely. it looked like a flying saucer and at the bottom of it looked like it was spinning relatively fast. i rubbed my eyes to see it better but when i looked again it wasn't there. rubbing my eyes only took like one or two seconds

after i saw these object i wasn't scared like i should have been. in fact i felt a longing to be up there with them.

on cloudy days i hear noises that sound like the noise of a plane only with a little bit of dipping sounds. you'd have to hear it to know how it sounds.

i think the ufos are monitering each and every one of us in person but i think they're also studying what us humans do when we see bizarre objects in the sky
content.summary: At school and in longview i saw a shiny object in the sky i also heard noises on cloudy days

content.detailedDescription:
���we were outside in the hot tub with the lights out looking for shooting stars. we 	saw a shooting star and said oooh, ahhh! then a triangle shaped object flew over 		our house approximately 400 to 500 feet up with very dim lighting (looked almost 		like it was reflecting starlight off it) then as it flew towards the tree line it banked 		towards the west out to the ocean. 

���what really stunned us all was the absence of any noise at all!! almost as if it were a fast moving glider. after searching the internet for hours, the only thing that comes close to what we saw is the pictures they have on space.Com. after discussing it between ourselves we think it not to be an et craft but something from the military. but why here in this little coastal town? what i read on space.Com almost exactly describes what we all saw, slow, low, big, silent and dim lighting.

���we live in eureka, california we have some military aircraft training here in the mountain ranges just east of us where they do maneuvers in the river canyons. however, we have never seen anything like this.���
content.summary: Dark, slow moving triangle overflew residence. lights on underside.

content.detailedDescription:
Un objeto luminoso aparecio mientras  platicasba por telefono.
primero se vio solo y despues se miro que eran dos y despues se transformaron en 3.
pero trate de mandarlo antes pero no salieron las fotos asi que lo intento de nuevo.
content.summary: Objeto luminoso

Today i saw. luminous objects while it spoke on the telephone

content.detailedDescription: There was a light flashing the sky and i was trying to snap a picture of it with my camera and this is what i came up with. i have gotten pictures of this object only once before. i posted several of them then.
content.summary: Resembled string of white beads in eastern north carolina sky

content.detailedDescription: I took this picture wednesday morning about 9:50am of a canister looking object in the sky. some will say that it is a plane out of focus because of the trail it is leaving. i tracked this object halfway across the sky before i snapped the picture giving the cam plenty of time to focus. when i take a picture of a plane at the same altitude the picture looks just like a plane. i took the picture from a field in front of my house. i enclose the original and an enhancement. any questions can be directed to http://www.Encmufon.Com/
content.summary: Canister flying through eastern north carolia sky

content.detailedDescription:
I have been noticing u.F.O. activity from the front of my house located in ft lauderdale on two occasions while visiting my family at that time. one sighting took place on the night of december 4, 2006 past midnight and the same on december 5, 2006 past midnight. on the night of december 4, 2006, i noticed that this particular u.F.O appeared to maneuver through a thick fleet of clouds at a very alarming rate, it was as if were using the clouds to cloak itself but the light exhibited from the craft made it's appearance very noticeable. this object seemed to fly in a serpent like motion through the sky as it displayed drastic changes in speed before coming to a halt and doing the same thing again. i was excited as i have seen u.F.O's before, so this is nothing new to me. i have been observing u.F.O's since my first sighting as a child in new york city and i have seen many since that time. i have been interviewed on live radio by the likes of brian vike and jeff rense, brian was very interested in a sighting that i had back in 2002, it was a very close encounted with a triangular craft.

so, this u.F.O was first witnessed by myself and then i went inside to inform family members of the craft that was dancing in the cloud scattered sky. i was now accompanied by my younger brother christian and we were patiently wathching this craft which appeared to be triangular in shape and although i may be wrong, due to not having equipment to have a better look, that will remain my best description of the object in question. now, on december 5, 2006 past midnight, it is fair to say that the same event took place but this time i was accompanied by my next door neighbor and we both saw the craft at the same exact time. 

it appeared to be the same craft from last night but my neighbor said that this trinagular shaped object exhibited some sign under it's belly that resembled the letter x, that x seemed to be displaying some form of light that fluctuated throughout the craft. what made this craft or shall i say sighting different from the night before was that it was much more active and that it was accompanied by what appeared to be other craft. i alongside my neighbor joseph (who was stunned by this whole event) stood outside for atleast five hours observing this craft until it escalated to a level that made it clear to us that the show was soon going to be over. at that time there was an even thicker fleet of clouds approaching the area and the craft ultimately was engulfed by these clouds and vanished. it was just about a minutes later that we spotted either the same or a different craft going at a magnificent speed in the same direction, i believe that it was a different craft.

i would like to note that the weather conditions were very cool and have been the coolest so far. i had to travel back to daytona beach the next day because my dog was just to much for the family to handle. if not, i am sure that i would have been able to see something amazing again the following night, that's just my gut feeling. as i have said earlier, this is nothing new to me, i see u.F.O's wherever i go. i believe that it's time for people to see what i see or to be aware of what i see in the night sky. that is why i have decided to share this with mufon, in an attempt to possibly meet and discuss this with likeminded individuals in the u.F.O community.
content.summary: Both sightings proved to be genuine and amazing, it was a must see event.

content.detailedDescription:
I have been noticing u.F.O. activity from the front of my house located in ft lauderdale on two occasions while visiting my family at that time. one sighting took place on the night of december 4, 2006 past midnight and the same on december 5, 2006 past midnight. on the night of december 4, 2006, i noticed that this particular u.F.O appeared to maneuver through a thick fleet of clouds at a very alarming rate, it was as if were using the clouds to cloak itself but the light exhibited from the craft made it's appearance very noticeable. this object seemed to fly in a serpent like motion through the sky as it displayed drastic changes in speed before coming to a halt and doing the same thing again. i was excited as i have seen u.F.O's before, so this is nothing new to me. i have been observing u.F.O's since my first sighting as a child in new york city and i have seen many since that time. i have been interviewed on live radio by the likes of brian vike and jeff rense, brian was very interested in a sighting that i had back in 2002, it was a very close encounted with a triangular craft.

so, this u.F.O was first witnessed by myself and then i went inside to inform family members of the craft that was dancing in the cloud scattered sky. i was now accompanied by my younger brother christian and we were patiently wathching this craft which appeared to be triangular in shape and although i may be wrong, due to not having equipment to have a better look, that will remain my best description of the object in question. now, on december 5, 2006 past midnight, it is fair to say that the same event took place but this time i was accompanied by my next door neighbor and we both saw the craft at the same exact time. 

it appeared to be the same craft from last night but my neighbor said that this trinagular shaped object exhibited some sign under it's belly that resembled the letter x, that x seemed to be displaying some form of light that fluctuated throughout the craft. what made this craft or shall i say sighting different from the night before was that it was much more active and that it was accompanied by what appeared to be other craft. i alongside my neighbor joseph (who was stunned by this whole event) stood outside for atleast five hours observing this craft until it escalated to a level that made it clear to us that the show was soon going to be over. at that time there was an even thicker fleet of clouds approaching the area and the craft ultimately was engulfed by these clouds and vanished. it was just about a minutes later that we spotted either the same or a different craft going at a magnificent speed in the same direction, i believe that it was a different craft.

i would like to note that the weather conditions were very cool and have been the coolest so far. i had to travel back to daytona beach the next day because my dog was just to much for the family to handle. if not, i am sure that i would have been able to see something amazing again the following night, that's just my gut feeling. as i have said earlier, this is nothing new to me, i see u.F.O's wherever i go. i believe that it's time for people to see what i see or to be aware of what i see in the night sky. that is why i have decided to share this with mufon, in an attempt to possibly meet and discuss this with likeminded individuals in the u.F.O community.
content.summary: This u.F.O exhibited tremendous sparks of light and hovered and maneuvered in the air effortlessly for hours until it vanished behind the thick clouds.

content.detailedDescription: Well i was on south prince street at the soda machine and i looked up at the sky and i saw four objects moveing together  at my first throught was that they were alian spacecrafts.They were going really slow but were still moveing i went in to tell my parents and came back out and they were still there i watched them for about 45 min. i noticed that they were red, orange, and blue in colors. and they were really far away but i througt they were oval in shape about 5 to 10 min. later they suddenly they just took off up into the sky and that was the last i saw them.When i first saw them i was curious and interasted and was glad that i have finally seen one after i was extremly happy because it sat in what i have really just seen.
content.summary: There were four objects in the sky over north mountain than they just zoomed up and out.
